common.banner_desc: With a source of highly entertaining and unique content, we are confident to deliver a good time of entertainment and top trending content on social networks to our audience.
common.address: No 1, Le Quang Dao Street, Me Tri Ward, Nam Tu Liem District, Ha noi
common.project_desc: We have great abilities to produce and exploit a large variety of engaging content, bringing high-quality content to a wide audience around the world.
common.project_1_desc: A process of restoring objects, from precious to common ones that are accidentally found in living environments, underground, or under the sea.
common.project_2_desc: Conveying meaningful messages through everyday life situations using animated films.
common.project_3_desc: Sharing survival experience in the wild by using skills of building shelters, hunting, gathering, farming...
common.contact_us_desc: Leave your email to book a strategic consultation with us
common.about_us_1: Founded in 2021, HNTD Network is a Multi-Platform Media and Entertainment Company. We specialize in Production, Content Creation, and Promotion of Entertainment Products on digital platforms.
common.about_us_2: With a talented and enthusiastic team, we have been making our utmost efforts towards a common goal of providing creative, refreshing, and appealing entertainment experiences to Vietnamese audiences in particular and global audiences in general.
common.about_us_3: We pride ourselves on delivering to the audience the trendiest content with lasting value as well as long-term and effective development partnerships.
common.mission_desc: Our mission is to provide the audience with creative, unique, and engaging entertainment experiences through optimizing content values as well as maximizing the potential of partners and entertainment brands.
common.vision_desc: With serious investment and relentless effort, HNTD Network aims to become a leading media and entertainment company in Vietnam, reach out to international standards, and possess a diverse and current digital content repository.
common.our_team_desc: At HNTD Network, we always encourage the spirit of young individuals, boldness, and daring to conquer. We aim to build a dynamic and enthusiastic environment to promote a work culture of comfort and creativity!
common.achievement_1: Building a system of fanpages with a large number of devoted fans
common.achievement_1_desc: Through engaging and creative content, we have established a fanpage system with millions of followers who are incredibly loyal.
common.achievement_2: Optimizing and generating massive views for the content
common.achievement_2_desc: With the mindset of always improving content quality and rapidly bringing videos to trends, our fanpages have been maintaining a number of over 600 million views per month.
common.achievement_3_desc: HNTD Network has been cooperating with many leading partners such as MCV Group, Vie Network, etc.
common.blog_desc: Một vài người nhìn quanh. Đôi mắt của Rita Skeeter mở to sau cặp kính nạm đá quý khi cô nhìn thấy người vừa nói.
common.job_desc: Join the HNTD Network team and grow together!
common.fill_the_form: Fill out the form below and HNTD Network’s team will contact you as soon as possible.
common.project_home_desc: The projects that HNTD Network has been doing with all our heart
common.fb_desc: Facebook platform is the key strength of HNTD Network. We are experienced in deploying and building a systematic and exclusive fanpage system with creative content that attracts viewers. With a deep understanding of the platform and user behaviors, we have achieved many successes in domestic and international markets.
common.tiktok_desc: The rise of TikTok - a short-form video platform - has opened up a unique space of creativity where we set up a communication support system for projects, stay ahead of new content trends, innovate and adapt to changes every day.
common.df_desc_1: Focusing on creating premium content with creativity and appeal.
common.df_desc_2: Utilizing the system's advantages to attract strong interaction from loyal audiences."
common.df_desc_3:
Producing wholesome and humane content to
maximize benefits for partners and the company
